short_summary: Temporary help services requirement for DND
description: DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS and qualified under the streams and categories above. Security level required: SECRET
duration_in_months: This is a temporarly help services for a period not specified
full_summary:
### National Defense Department – Request for Proposal

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-343-73006219
* **Solicitation Number**: S4723943
* **Publication Date**: November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 23, 2023, at 15:00
* **Area of Operation**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA) for Temporary Help Services.

#### Services Required

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires the services of a Temporary Help Service provider for Computer Application Support (UNSpsc code: 80111600) at National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Important Information

* This tender is open to Supply Arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who are qualified under the 5.1 Computer Application Support stream and category.
* Only the following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
	1. 1019837 Ontario Inc.
	2. ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC. (in Joint Venture)
	3. Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
	4. CIMA+ S.E.N.C.
	5. ENET4S SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS LTD
	6. iFathom Corporation
	7. IPSS INC.
	8. MAKWA Resourcing Inc.
	9. MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
	10. MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. (in Joint Venture)
	11. Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
	12. Quallium Corporation
	13. Robertson & Company Ltd.
	14. SEASI Consulting Inc.
	15. TRM Technologies Inc.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the scope of services and the proposed methodology.

#### Deadline for Proposal Submission

The deadline for submitting a proposal is November 23, 2023, at 15:00.

#### Contact Information

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Phone: 613-971-795
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)

 Note: The UNSPSC code, the trade agreement
